title: conferred on him by section 4 of the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance) 
Act 2008 (Designation of Japan in Accordance with the Agreement with Japan) 
Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (mutual assistance) act 2008 (designation japan accordance agreement japan) order 2020

title: conferred on him by section 4 of the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance) Act
heading: Japan is designated for the purposes of mutual assistance between the
text_raw:
2. 

Japan is designated for the purposes of mutual assistance between the 
State and it under the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance) Act 2008 (No. 7 of 
2008) in accordance with the Agreement with Japan. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Foreign 
Affairs and Trade, 
28 April, 2020. 

SIMON COVENEY, 

Minister for Foreign Affairs and Trade. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 1st May, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [151] 3

title: conferred on him by section 4 of the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance) Act
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order designates Japan for the purposes of mutual assistance between the 
State and Japan under the Criminal Justice (Mutual Assistance) Act 2008, in 
accordance with the Agreement between the European Union and Japan on 
mutual legal assistance in criminal matters, done at Brussels on 30 November 
2009 and at Tokyo on 15 December 2009. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [151]
